GoodShivs: SaltTheWounds.NAME: Salt The Wounds
GoodShivs: SaltTheWounds.DESCRIPTION: Each enemy loses 2 hp per OpenWound. NL Does not remove OpenWounds. NL Exhaust.
GoodShivs: SaltTheWounds.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each enemy loses 2 hp per OpenWound twice. NL Does not remove OpenWounds. NL Exhaust.

Shiv.NAME: Shiv
Shiv.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 OpenWound. NL Exhaust.

Storm of Steel.NAME: Salty Blade Storm
Storm of Steel.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Add 1 Shiv per card discarded. NL Add 1 Salt The Wounds
Storm of Steel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Add 1 Shiv+ per card discarded. NL Add 1 Salt The Wounds

Accuracy2.NAME: Good Accuracy
Accuracy2.DESCRIPTION: OpenWounds give 50% bonus damage per stack.
